it.camit.jsapp.core.util.command.base

Class SappCommand

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.camit.jsapp.core.util.command.base.SappCommand
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Sapp70Command, Sapp71Command, Sapp72Command, Sapp73Command, Sapp74Command, Sapp75Command, Sapp76Command, Sapp77Command, Sapp78Command, Sapp79Command, Sapp7ACommand, Sapp7BCommand, Sapp7CCommand, Sapp7DCommand, Sapp7ECommand, Sapp7FCommand, Sapp80Command, Sapp81Command, Sapp82Command

    public class SappCommand
extends Object

    Base Class for Command execution

    SappCommand can either be directly used for custom commands or be subclassed

    Author:
    Paolo Denti

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected byte[] command
      Command to be executed
      protected SappResponse response
      Response from command execution

      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected SappCommand()
      Empty constructor for the subclasses that will provide their command

    • Constructor Detail

      • SappCommand

        public SappCommand(byte[] command)

        Constructor that creates command from a byte array.

        Parameters:
        command - A byte array that must be filled with all the command bytes defined in Sapp protocol

      • SappCommand

        protected SappCommand()

        Empty constructor for the subclasses that will provide their command

    • Method Detail

      • getResponse

        public SappResponse getResponse()

        Returns the response filled by the run method

      • isResponseOk

        public boolean isResponseOk()

        Checks against a valid response present

        Returns:
        true if a valid response is present; false otherwise

      • run

        public void run(String hostName,
       int portNumber)
         throws SappException

        Executes the command.

        A SappConnection is internally managed for hostName and portNumber

        Parameters:
        hostName - the device address or hostname
        portNumber - the device port
        Throws:
        SappException

      • run

        protected void run(SappConnection sappConnection)
            throws SappException

        Executes the command.

        A SappConnection must be provided. To be used for processes that keep a SappConnection alive.

        Parameters:
        sappConnection - A SappConnection possibly created by SappConnection
        Throws:
        SappException
